title: An ‘Aggressive Love for Life’ Regardless of Life’s Challenges
description: Months after Bradley Carbone met Barbara Torasso, he broke his neck snowboarding. A long recovery brought them closer together.
dc:creator: Tammy La Gorce
media:credit: Natalie Keyssar for The New York Times
media:description: Bradley Carbone and Barbara Torasso celebrated their union with 300 friends and family at the Boom Boom Room on Sept. 26. “The thread that runs through this relationship is, we do everything as fully as possible,” Mr. Carbone said.
